title: Message
description:
The messages supported by the StepFlow protocol. These correspond to JSON-RPC 2.0 messages.

Note that this defines a superset containing both client-sent and server-sent messages.

params.title: Parameters
params.description: The parameters for the method call. Set on method requests.

JsonRpc.title: JSON-RPC Version
JsonRpc.description: The version of the JSON-RPC protocol.

RequestId.title: JSON-RPC Request ID.
RequestId.description:
The identifier for a JSON-RPC request. Can be either a string or an integer.
The RequestId is used to match method responses to corresponding requests.
It should not be set on notifications.

InitializeParams.title: Parameters for initialize method.
InitializeParams.description: Sent from StepFlow to the component server to begin the initialization process.

runtime_protocol_version.description: Maximum version of the protocol being used by the StepFlow runtime.

protocol_prefix.description: The protocol prefix for components served by this plugin (e.g., "python", "typescript")

ComponentExecuteParams.title: Parameters for components/execute method.
ComponentExecuteParams.description: Sent from StepFlow to the component server to execute a specific component with the provided input.

Component.description: Identifies a specific plugin and atomic functionality to execute.

Value.description: Any JSON value (object, array, string, number, boolean, or null)

ComponentInfoParams.title: Parameters for components/info method.
ComponentInfoParams.description: Sent from StepFlow to the component server to request information about a specific component.

component.description: The component to get information about.

ComponentListParams.title: Parameters for components/list method.
ComponentListParams.description: Sent from StepFlow to the component server to request a list of all available components.

GetBlobParams.title: Parameters for blobs/get method.
GetBlobParams.description: Sent from the component server to the StepFlow to retrieve the content of a specific blob.

blob_id.description: The ID of the blob to retrieve.

BlobId.title: Blob ID
BlobId.description: A SHA-256 hash of the blob content, represented as a hexadecimal string.

PutBlobParams.title: Parameters for blobs/put method.
PutBlobParams.description: Sent from the component server to the StepFlow to store a blob with the provided content.

MethodSuccess.description: The result of a successful method execution.

result.title: Method Result
result.description: The result of a successful method execution.

InitializeResult.title: Response for initialize method.
InitializeResult.description:
Sent from the component server back to StepFlow with the result of initialization.
The component server will not be initialized until it receives the `initialized` notification.

server_protocol_version.description: Version of the protocol being used by the component server.

ComponentExecuteResult.title: Response for components/execute method.
ComponentExecuteResult.description: Sent from the component server back to StepFlow with the result of the component execution.

output.description: The result of the component execution.

ComponentInfoResult.title: Response for components/info method.
ComponentInfoResult.description: Sent from the component server back to StepFlow with information about the requested component.

input_schema.description:
The input schema for the component.

Can be any valid JSON schema (object, primitive, array, etc.).

output_schema.description:
The output schema for the component.

Can be any valid JSON schema (object, primitive, array, etc.).

SchemaRef.description: Type alias for a shared schema reference.

ListComponentsResult.title: Response for components/list method.
ListComponentsResult.description: Sent from the component server back to StepFlow with a list of all available components.

components.description: A list of all available components.

GetBlobResult.title: Response for blobs/get method.
GetBlobResult.description: Sent from the StepFlow back to the component server with the content of the requested blob.

PutBlobResult.title: Response for blobs/put method.
PutBlobResult.description: Sent from the StepFlow back to the component server with the ID of the stored blob.

error.description: An error that occurred during method execution.

Error.title: Error object
Error.description: An error returned from a method execution.

code.title: Error code
code.description: A numeric code indicating the error type.

message.title: Error message
message.description: Concise, single-sentence description of the error.

data.title: Error data
data.description: Primitive or structured value that contains additional information about the error.

Initialized.title: Parameters for initialized notification.
Initialized.description: Sent from StepFlow to the component server after initialization is complete.
